jchess.gamelogic

Class RuleAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gamelogic.RuleAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule, IRuleAgent

    public class RuleAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRuleAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Rule" (only) related data. It keeps the state of the Rule and ensures validity and expiry of the Rule.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
